text: Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion

Sorry, Producer,
for having you accompany me on my shopping trip.
No problem at all.

I don't usually come to shopping malls like this unless
it's for work, you know. It's fun to browse around.
In fact, I'm lucky to be your companion.

Haha... you're kind.
But I understand why places like this make your heart race.

I also rely on you to accompany me because
location shoots alone aren't enough.

Haha, sure!
We have time, so let's wander around until we're satisfied.
Yeah.

Don't hesitate to tell me if there's a
shop you're interested in too.

Whether it's clothes or goods...
I want to witness the moment you find your favorite.
Unlike Sakuya, that's not something I excel at...

Oh?
Do I make for a good image?

You do. You seem like you'd have everything
perfectly chosen even for daily shopping.
Haha, I wonder what kind of image that is──
…? Sakuya?

──Oh, no, sorry.
I shouldn't be distracted when I'm with you.
…There's a stuffed animal over there.
Oh, really? Let's take a look!
No, it's okay...

Um... I can't take it home with me,
and I'd just end up appreciating its cuteness for no reason...

...? Can't take it home?
If you like it, just buy it.
...Something so cute, I...

...
You probably think it doesn't suit me, right...?
──Huh?!

Huh, Sakuya!
Who said something like that to you!?
Who said that kind of thing...!?

N-No, that's not it.
It's just that, I've often been expected to be "cool", so...
and I worried I might disappoint──
Absolutely not!

If it might create a negative impression, then I should consider it,
but there's nothing wrong with Sakuya having cute things.

You can like what you like as much as you want,
and take care of them lovingly.

I think Sakuya, with that stuffed animal,
would be wonderful.
──Thank you, Producer.

Then, if you don't mind...
may I go take a look?
Of course!
